document_data.name: Ulthar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulthar''' was the most patient of the librarians living in [[Gravenhollow]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ulthar was always busy sorting and filing ancient texts, maintaining the immeasurably vast catalog that organized them. When he was not cross-referencing the expanding collection, Ulthar composed epic poetry and restored and curated the wall carvings of the library.
document_data.Personality: Ulthar had infinite patience and was the most disposed to interacting with guests, speaking to them about ancient history.
